channel.description: Recent content in RE on Liyan Tang

item.title: Overlook of Relation Extraction
item.description: Information Extraction v.s. Relation Extraction Information Extraction: Information extraction is the task of automatically extracting structured information from unstructured and/or semi-structured machine-readable documents and other electronically represented sources. Relation extraction (RE) is an important task in IE. It focuses on extracting relations between entities. A complete relation RE system consists of a named entity recognizer to identify named entities from text. an entity linker to link entities to existing knowledge graphs.

item.title: Paper Review - Connecting the Dots: Document-level Neural Relation Extraction with Edge-oriented Graphs
item.description: Authors: Fenia Christopoulou, Makoto Miwa, Sophia Ananiadou
